Tests pausing a running script and stepping

Running test: testPauseAndStep
Instantiate
Wait for script
Got wasm script: wasm://wasm/c84b7cde
Run
Expecting to pause at 61
Paused at offset 61; wasm-expression-stack: []; local: [12 (i32)]
